channel.title: Sachinthra N V
channel.description: Portfolio of Sachinthra N V - SDE-2 at HPE specializing in cloud solutions, backend development, and IoT projects. Explore projects in Go, Python, Robotics, IOT, React, Docker, and Raspberry Pi.

item.title: Home Server (The Hub)
item.description: How I replaced paid cloud services with a Raspberry Pi 4, Docker, and 1TB of storage running 24/7 in my living room.

item.title: NAS Project
item.description: Building a reliable, multi-protocol NAS (SMB, NFS, FTP) on a Raspberry Pi 4 using OpenMediaVault.

item.title: File Locker
item.description: A production-ready encrypted file storage and streaming system built from scratch using Go, Docker, and AES-256 encryption.
